turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A small for all four of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pepperoni, one meat lovers, one buffalo chicken, and one with sausage and banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, you are ordering 4 small pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 meatlovers, 1 buffalo chicken, and 1 sausage and banana peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I have one special instruction.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Bella Luna charges for extra cheese, your new total will be $56, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, enjoy your pizzas.
